description: Angry Birds is a popular mobile game where players use a slingshot to launch birds at structures in order to defeat green pigs and rescue stolen eggs. It features physics-based gameplay, various bird characters with unique abilities, and challenging levels with different obstacles and puzzles.

Angry Birds Space is a sequel to the original Angry Birds game, but set in outer space. It introduces new gameplay elements such as gravity fields, planetary bodies, and space-themed levels. Players use a slingshot to launch birds at structures in order to defeat space pigs and rescue eggs, while taking into account the effects of gravity and other space-related challenges.
